hero.headline: Professional Dog Walking & Pet Care
hero.subheadline: Keeping tails wagging across town since 2018

about.title: About Scott's Dogs
about.description: I've always had a special connection with dogs and turned my passion into a profession. With over 5 years of experience, I provide personalized dog walking services that keep your furry friends happy, healthy, and exercised. Each walking session is tailored to your dog's energy level, age, and personality. Your pet's safety and wellbeing are my top priorities, and I treat every dog as if they were my own.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Flexible dog walking options to suit your pet's needs and your schedule

items.title: Solo Walk
items.description: One-on-one attention for dogs who need special care or prefer their own space.
details: Full attention to your dog only
Route tailored to your dog's preferences

items.title: Group Walk
items.description: Social walks with up to 4 compatible dogs for fun and friendship.

items.title: Puppy Package
items.description: Gentle care for younger dogs with bathroom breaks and basic training.

items.title: Adventure Walk
items.description: Extended outdoor experience for high-energy dogs who need extra exercise.

items.title: Training Add-On
items.description: Reinforce basic commands and work on specific behaviors during walks.

items.title: Home Visit Service
items.description: Quick visit to your home to feed, provide fresh water, and let your dog out.

items.title: Fully Insured & DBS Checked
items.description: Your pets are protected with comprehensive insurance coverage and you can trust our background-checked service.

items.title: Reliable & Punctual
items.description: Count on consistent walk times with real-time updates and photos of your happy pup during their adventure.

items.title: Passionate About Pets
items.description: Every dog receives personalized attention, treats (with permission), and plenty of affection from our experienced handlers.

quotes.name: Emma R.
quotes.quote: My hyperactive Lab has never been calmer since Scott started taking him on adventure walks. Worth every penny!

quotes.name: James T.
quotes.quote: Scott is amazing with my anxious rescue dog. The photo updates during walks give me such peace of mind when I'm at work.

items.question: Do you walk dogs in all weather conditions?
items.answer: Yes, we walk in most weather conditions except severe storms or extreme heat. For bad weather days, we offer shorter walks or indoor play sessions as alternatives.

items.question: How many dogs do you walk at once?
items.answer: For group walks, we maintain a maximum of 4 dogs per walker to ensure proper supervision and safety. Solo walks are always one-on-one.

items.question: What areas do you cover?
items.answer: We currently serve the entire town and surrounding villages within a 5-mile radius. Contact us to confirm if you're within our service area.

items.question: What happens if my dog doesn't get along with others?
items.answer: We offer solo walks specifically for dogs who prefer their own space or don't socialize well with other dogs.

contact.title: Book Your Dog's Next Adventure
contact.description: Ready to give your furry friend the exercise and attention they deserve? Contact us to schedule a meet-and-greet or book your first walk.
